description: This hearty vegetable pesto soup is made with carrots, peas and mushrooms simmered in a flavorful pesto broth with orzo pasta. It takes only 20 minutes to make!
name: 20 Minute Veggie Orzo Pesto Soup
recipeIngredient: 8 oz. white button mushrooms (cleaned and sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Place broth and water in large saucepan or stock pot and bring to a simmer. Add mushrooms and carrots. Lower heat and simmer for 7 minutes.
Add orzo and simmer until fully cooked and veggies are tender, about 8 minutes.
Stir in peas, pesto, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Taste test and adjust as needed. Ladle into bowls and serve.
